data: The event "Q2 Technical Presentation" was about API enhancements and infrastructure upgrades.
The event "Q2 Technical Presentation" announced the release of API v2.
The event "Q2 Technical Presentation" reviewed performance benchmarks and reported a 30% improvement.
The event "Q2 Technical Presentation" featured a live demo of the new feature.
The event "Q2 Technical Presentation" decided to start migration in July and to allocate budget for new servers.
The event "Q2 Technical Presentation" assigned operations teams to prepare servers as an action item.
The event "Q2 Technical Presentation" assigned development teams to finalize tests as an action item.
